name: Tool
startIntroPart1: Deaf and blind and dumb and born to follow What you need is someone strong to guide you Like me.
startIntroPart2: I had a friend once, he took some acid Now he thinks he's a fire engine It's okay until he pisses on your lighter Kinda smells, kinda cool, kinda funny anyway
declaringWar: This is necessary Life feeds on life feeds on life feeds on life feeds on
attacked: Someone told me once that there's a right and wrong Punishment was sure for those who dare to cross the line
defeated: If there were no rewards to reap No loving embrace to see me through This tedious path I've chosen here I certainly would've walked away by now
introduction: Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey
neutralHello: Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey Hey, hey-ah, hey, hey, hey-ah Hey, hey-ah, hey
neutralLetsHearIt: A groan of tedium escapes me Startling the fearful
neutralNo: He had a lot to say He had a lot of nothing to say
neutralYes: Shoulder deep within the borderline Relax, turn around and take my hand
hateHello: What was it like to see The face of your own stability Suddenly look away Leaving you with the dead and hopeless?
hateLetsHearIt: What you want and what you need Don't mean that much to me I can see your Back is turning If I could I'd Stick a knife in
hateNo: If consequences dictate My course of action, I should I should play God and just Shoot you myself
hateYes: Consequences dictate Our course of action and it Doesn't matter what's right It's only wrong if you get caught
afterPeace: Used to be a bunch of assholes that lived in this part of the building here. But we systematically removed them like you would any kind of termite or roach.
tradeRequest: Lay back and let me show you another way
